tools.description: Shows time-series analysis of monthly spend, revenue, engagement, and conversions with month-over-month growth calculations. Use when users ask about trends, historical performance, or seasonal patterns.

configuration.query:
FROM campaign-performance
| EVAL month = DATE_TRUNC(1 month, TO_DATETIME(Date))
| EVAL roi = TO_DOUBLE(Revenue - Spend) / Spend * 100
| STATS
    monthly_spend = SUM(Spend),
    monthly_revenue = SUM(Revenue),
    avg_engagement = AVG(`Engagement Rate`),
    total_conversions = SUM(Conversions),
    avg_roi = AVG(roi)
  BY month
| SORT month ASC
